description: A half priced boardgaming podcast, hosted by Raf Cordero & Charlie Theel

episodes.title: Episode 55 - Playing with Strangers
episodes.description:
Charlie and Raf discuss playing games with strangers. Whether at a meetup, a con, or a local game shop, we often run into opportunities to game with people we don't know. This can be a tricky situation, and they talk about how they approach it. Before that it's Pandemic Legacy Season 2 (NO SPOILERS), Battlestations 2nd Edition, Vegas Wits & Wagers, and World Championship Russian Roulette.

episodes.title: Episode 15 - Why We Game
episodes.description:
Description: Raf and Charlie talk a few games as usual and then dive into an introspective segment on why they play games and some of their favorites.

Games Discussed: I'm The Boss, Downfall Of Pompeii, Skull, Forbidden Stars, Eclipse, Suburbia, X-Wing

episodes.title: Episode 14 - Pack O Games & Gordon Calleja
episodes.description: Gordon Calleja, designer of Posthuman, joins Raf & Charlie for a talk about board game design, video game design, and the challenges of building a game design industry in the country of Malta. They also talk about recent games and review the Pack o Games Set 2 Kickstarter!

episodes.title: Episode 13 - Techno Bowl Review And Brent Spivey Interview
episodes.description: Raf and Charlie talk some new apocalyptic titles before talking to designer Brent Spivey about his upcoming release Techno Bowl.

episodes.title: Bonus Episode 1  - SPOILERS - Rob Daviau Continued
episodes.description: In this special bonus release, Raf talks to Rob Daviau about a couple of spoiler-y Pandemic Legacy questions.

episodes.title: Episode 12 - Rob Daviau Interview
episodes.description:
In this episode, we cut our usual stuff a little short because Rob Daviau, co-designer of Pandemic: Legacy and more stops by to talk about his history as a designer and the past, present, and future of Legacy games. There are NO SPOILERS in this episode.

BGG link for discussion, contains the other links: https://boardgamegeek.com/article/21772514#21772514

Vela Cards link for SuperShow: http://www.velacards.com/

Tangled Web: http://www.thetangledweb.net/forums/

episodes.title: Episode 11 - Pandemic Legacy with Nate Owens
episodes.description: Raf and Charlie talk recent plays before Raf leaves Charlie behind to talk Pandemic Legacy with Review Corner writer Nate Owens.

episodes.title: Episode 10 - The 2015 Ding & Dent Awards Show
episodes.description:
Raf and Charlie close out 2015 with a series of Ding & Dent awards for top picks of the year.

They also launch a new contest to win one of the titles discussed in the episode.

episodes.title: Episode 9 - Craig Cillessen & Clockwork Wars Review
episodes.description: Another Review Corner writer joins us, as Craig Cillessen stops by and talks to us about how he combined Imperial Assault and Armada to remake the battle of Endor! After talking about Euros and RPGs, Raf and Charlie review the excellent Clockwork Wars.

episodes.title: Episode 8 - Nate Hayden Interview
episodes.description:
Raf & Charlie talk about some of the good games they've been playing lately, including a solo game, a dexterity game, and 504 which can't really be put into a box. Except the one it comes in, technically. Afterwards, Nate Hayden stops by to talk about the design process for his experiential games like Cave Evil, Psycho Raiders, and Mushroom Eaters.

Cave Evil and Warcults - http://www.cave-evil.com/

Games discussed: Detective: City Of Angels, '65: Squad Level Combat In The Jungles Of Vietnam, Rampage, Terror In Meeple City, Airborne Commander, 504, Survive: Space Attack!, Cave Evil, The Mushroom Eaters, Warcults, Psycho Raiders

episodes.title: Episode 7 - Ding & Dent's Holiday Gift Guide!
episodes.description:
The holidays are here and Raf & Charlie have been playing a lot of games. It's a bit of an international episode as Charlie plays a Fallout/Mad Max mashup out of Poland and Raf has a hand in causing a Euro Crisis in a game out of Germany. They wrap the episode up with their first listener suggested segment: a Holiday Gift Giving Guide. They each choose something for a Family Game, Strategy Game, OH MY GOD Game, and the perfect option for your White Elephant or gag gift events.

Euro Crisis link: http://www.doppeldenk-spiele.de/news.php (There is a button to switch to English in their menu)

Games Discussed: Star Wars: Rebellion, WARCULTS, Star Wars: Risk, Euro Crisis, Waste Knights, Legendary: Predator, Rhino Hero, Codenames, Dead of Winter, Specter Ops, Clockwork Wars, X-Wing Miniatures, Loopin' Chewie, and Pie Face

episodes.title: Episode 6 - Pete Ruth, Boardgames As Art, And The Grizzled Review
episodes.description:
In episode 6 Raf and Charlie talk the new direction of Ding and Dent and about the future.  Pete Ruth, writer from The Review Corner, joins the podcast as a special guest.  Finally, Raf and Charlie discuss board games as art and review 2015's The Grizzled.

Games Discussed: The Grizzled, Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition Starter, Firestorm Armada, T.I.M.E Stories

episodes.title: Episode 5 - Sandy Petersen Interview And Premium Games
episodes.description:
For the first time (but probably not the last), Raf & Charlie are both excited about the same game! After a brief discussion of recent plays, Sandy Petersen of Cthulhu Wars fame stops by to talk about his games and the rise of big expensive "Premium Games". We talk about their place in gaming the role of Kickstarter in bringing them to life. Raf also gives his brief impression of BattleBin, a monthly mystery box product.

Fireteam Zero Unboxing - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bNY15PST254

Battlebin Unboxing - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qlxbVEbV7nc

Games Discussed: Fireteam Zero, Champions of Midgard, Blood Rage, Hyperborea, Cthulhu Wars, Chaos in the Old World.

episodes.title: Ep 4 - Asymmetrical Games
episodes.description:
In this episode, Charlie plays a King of Tokyo Killer and Raf bends the knee before the new Game of Throne Card Game. We then chat about one of our favorite types of games: Asymmetrical Games.

Games discussed: T.I.M.E Stories, Game of Thrones 2.0 card game, Pandemic Legacy, Ultimate Warriorz, Apocalypse Chaos, Forbidden Stars, Cthulhu Wars, Chaos in the Old World, Small World, Netrunner, Fire in the Lake, Robinson Crusoe, Claustrophobia

episodes.title: Episode 3 - Playtesting And Jamey Stegmaier Interview
episodes.description:
In this episode, Raf talks some accessible wargames, Charlie plays Two Rooms & a Boom, they both talk about playtesting board games and Jamey Stegmaier stops by for an interview!

Games discussed: Blood Rage, Spaceteam, Fire in the Lake, Two Rooms & a Boom, Churchill, X-Wing Miniatures Game, Viticulture, Scythe

episodes.title: Episode 2 - Star Wars Special And Imperial Assault Review
episodes.description:
The force is strong with our Star Wars Special! Raf and Charlie talk a bit about what they're excited about and have been playing lately before diving head first into the amazing world of Star Wars. They talk about the new "Force Friday" releases, FFG's handling of the Star Wars IP, and wrap things up with an in depth review of Imperial Assault.

Games Discussed: More Ca$h 'n More Guns, News@11, Mafia de Cuba, Legacy: Gears of Time, Star Wars Risk, X-Wing: The Miniatures Game, Loopin' Chewie, Imperial Assault

episodes.title: Episode 1 - Gateway Games And Jon Gilmour
episodes.description: Ding & Dent is a half price boardgaming podcast. In this episode, your hosts Raf & Charlie discuss the games that got them into the hobby, the games they've been playing recently, and interview designer Jon Gilmour. Responsible for last year's breakout hit Dead of Winter, Jon discusses the friendship making philosophy of his new company and upcoming games. We hope you enjoy, and remember, all downloads final. No refunds
